TopicTitle: JPL robot research-The relevance of the DLC

Articles.Content:
This JPL newsletter just showed up in my inbox today.  It shows just how relevant the new DLC is to real-world research.  I would love to have some of those drilling grip parts, however 

 

https://www.jpl.nasa.gov/news/news.php?feature=7449&utm_source=iContact&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=nasajpl&utm_content=weekly20190712-9
